title: Top 10 Xposed Modules 2016
tags: The Complete List of Marshmallow-Compatible Xposed Modules
The Best Xposed Modules For Your Android
how to installed the Xposed framework
description: Click here for all download links and update list of Xposed modules  Looking for some fresh Xposed Modules? Well, here are 10 must have Xposed Modules For Android. While it's easy to find these Xposed modules from Xposed Module Repository, in this video I'll show you some of the must have Xposed modules.  All modules are tested in Android Lollipop and Marshmallow.   Please look at XDA or Google, how to installed the Xposed framework. The steps are different for each device and it's not possible for me to give you a one-click solution that works for everyone.    [Video content]  #1 Android N-ify 1:19 #2 Lockscreen Mod 1:56 #3 WhatsAppX 2:18 #4 Power Nap 2:56 #5 One Tap Video Downloader 3:53 #6 Zoom for Instagram 4:26 #7 Stay Awake 4:58 #8 YouTube in Background 5:38 #9 Knock Code 6:27 #10 Spotify Skip 7:02    I use Audio from YouTube audio library.
